the only two things that bothered me was:

one of the most overrated games ever

游戏关卡设计的天花板。
本来作为一名车抢球还好者，对这类烧脑游戏可以说是不感兴趣，但传送门2只通过简单的两个传送门和复杂精密的关卡设计给我带来解密过关的乐趣，特别是每次想出解法后的那种成就感给了我一口气通关游戏的动力。
但这游戏也有点缺点，玩久了费脑头疼。QAQ
The story is great and the puzzles are annoying but satisfying to solve
Great game, Great graphics, Great everything, But it would be nice for a extended story mode

Wheatley's is the best and worst character

And I cant get Glados's voice out of my head pls send help

One of my steam friends keeps trying to play this game with me. I want to tell him that I don't like him but he keeps coming back. I tried blocking him - he dodged the blocks with dozens of alt accounts. I lay awake at night knowing that he will send me an invite every time I turn on my pc. I made a new steam account but he found it somehow (I used a separate pc and a VPN when making it). This game has made it impossible for me to use technology, hell he even sent me an invite through my electric toothbrush. The game play is fine though, it's worth the money.

Not gonna lie, if I was to name a game off the top of my head and call it my favorite, this could be the one. This is the game that got me into other gaming, I love the sound design, to the world building, to the voice acting; 10/10, all around fantastic experience... definitely play the first game before this though for an even better experience in this game. Enjoy!  ; D
This game is REALLY fun and amazing! It is a game that makes you think alot! and it makes alot of sense!

The best puzzle game since tetris.
The singleplayer gives you some very well thought out puzzles that make you feel smart, and a great story to go with it. The coop gives you one of the best cooperative experiences in videogames period.
This is a mustbuy for anyone who likes puzzle-games and is yet another one of valves masterpieces.
9.5/10
Simply one of the best games
Amazing game overall, just waiting for Portal 3 like everyone else....Valve please....
This a fun puzzle and portal game.
